name: Legend of Zelda Remake (Sofie Vang Nielsen)
name_original: Legend of Zelda Remake (Sofie Vang Nielsen)
description:
A little self projekt i worked on during my spring break after having had Programing in my second year at HTX,  The Code is Confusing and not segmented, but im proud that i was able to make it at all.

All the Code is my work, but the Sprite art i found somewhere on google, i belive it was at The Legend of Zelda Sprite Sheets - NES - Zelda Galaxy.com, but im not sure, it was quite a few years ago.

(pygame (Python))

Disclaimer: 

I dont make any money of of this, this is only here to show of my coding,  even then all of the code is mine, i have never even looked at the original game code.

but if you are from nintendo and want this taken down for some reason then just contact me and i will do so.
